Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")

Docs.summary: Enables communication between the host and the script engine. This interface is implemented by the host.

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetCompiledState (out byte[] pe, out byte[] debugInfo);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetCompiledState(unsigned int8[] pe, unsigned int8[] debugInfo) cil managed

Docs.param: The compiled state of the engine; an assembly in byte form.
The debugging information for the assembly, or a null reference if such information does not exist or is not available.
Docs.summary: Gets the compiled state of a script engine, and, optionally, associated debugging information.

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetEventSourceInstance (string itemName, string eventSourceName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetEventSourceInstance(string itemName, string eventSourceName) cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a reference to an event source previously added to a script engine using the <xref:Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaCodeItem.AddEventSource%2A> method.
Docs.returns: Returns the event source to the engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetGlobalInstance(string name) cil managed

Docs.param: Gets a reference to a global item, such as the host-provided application object.
Docs.summary: Gets a reference to a global item, such as the host-provided application object.
Docs.returns: Returns a reference to the global object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Notify (string notify, object info);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Notify(string notify, object info) cil managed

Docs.param: Notifies the host about events generated by the .NET script engine.
Notifies the host about events generated by the .NET script engine.
Docs.summary: Notifies the host about events generated by the .NET script engine.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool OnCompilerError(class Microsoft.JScript.Vsa.IJSVsaError error) cil managed

Docs.param: The object representing the offending error.
Docs.summary: Notifies the host about how to respond to compiler errors encountered by the script engine.
Docs.returns: Returns TRUE if the compiler is directed to continue reporting further errors to the object. Returns FALSE if the compiler is directed to stop reporting further errors to the object.
